modName: The Dovah Ting (Goes Fus Ro Skraa) - Menu Replacer
summary: Man's not hot. There's a dragon. Skraa pa pa. Now man's hot. Ka ka ka. Raw sauce. No. Not sauce. Dat blood. BOOM
descriptionHtml:
Man's not hot. There's a dragon. Skraa pa pa. Now man's hot. Ka ka ka. Raw sauce. No. Not sauce. Dat blood. BOOM
---

Replaces the menu screen with Roadman Shaq and the menu music with a Skyrim theme/Man's Not Hot (The Ting Goes) mashup.

This is literally the worst thing I've ever created. It's just a meme. Take it or leave it.

Credits:
Bethesda for lies
Michael Dappah aka Big Shaq for the parody song 'Man's not hot'.

[youtube]CLLkoR68g6M[/youtube]
author: elderscrolliangamer aka Publick Gamer
